item.title: Install rpm via Ansible
item.description: Manual sudo rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm In Ansible: - name: Add Web Static Repo yum: name: https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm state: present
